title: From classes in the Weyl group to strata
abstract:
In a 2015 paper we have defined a map from the set of conjugacy classes in a
Weyl group W to the set of irreducible representations of W (its image
parametrizes the strata of a reductive group with Weyl group W). In this paper
we provide evidence that this map makes sense even when W is replaced by a
noncrystallographic Coxeter group,
